description: Innovation is a major dimension of business success. But what innovating and how do we innovate? Everyone he is able, in a business or in everyday life? We think so and that's what we want you to discover by sharing with you a simple approach: four stages of exploration, creativity but also of confrontation with reality to bring out the innovative potential that lies within each of us. Creative Box is open to all classes, free and accessible online. A course which offers two certifications from a prestigious management school, ESSCA a course offered by a teacher anxious to transmit a sharp know more. A course richly illustrated based on concrete examples. A course that you takes the field for you to share testimonies of professional large companies (PSA Peugeot CitroÃ«n, institute CSA) or startupers youth (Cook-ease, Meat-me).
title: Creative Box (French)
